subject: Running
Track and Field
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The sprinter Allyson Felix will run the 100 and 200 meters at the U.S. Olympic trials, forgoing an attempt at a 400-200 double in London, said her coach, Bob Kersee.
snippet: The sprinter Allyson Felix will run the 100 and 200 meters at the U.S. Olympic trials, forgoing an attempt at a 400-200 double in London, said her coach, Bob Kersee.
